name: accursed
description: blessed contributions, extensions, typings, documentation and apps

scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.copy: cp src/declarations/*.d.ts dist/src/declarations && rm -rf dist/src/index.d.ts && cp dist/src/index_publish.d.ts dist/src/index.d.ts
scripts.doc-blessed-md: rm -rf docs/blessed-md; mkdir -p docs/blessed-md ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations --mdHideSources --name blessed --readme none --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/declarations/blessed.d.ts' --theme markdown --out docs/blessed-md --excludeExternals --mdDocusaurus
scripts.doc-blessed: rm -rf docs/blessed; mkdir -p docs/blessed ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations --mdHideSources --name blessed --readme none --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/declarations/blessed.d.ts' --out docs/blessed --excludeExternals
scripts.doc-md: rm -rf docs/; mkdir docs/blessed ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations --mdHideSources --name accursed --readme name --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/index_publish.ts' --theme markdown --out docs/api --excludeExternals
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test

author: Sebastian Gurin
